tm.tmXY: probability of going from ISCED X to ISCED Y

category.name: CAT
category.description: probability child surpasses parent's educational category (conditional on parent not having tertiary)

years_of_schooling.name: YOS
years_of_schooling.description: probability child surpasses parent's years of schooling

years_of_schooling.name: DIF
years_of_schooling.description: mean change in years of schooling conditional on parent not having tertiary

years_of_schooling.name: COR
years_of_schooling.description: correlation coefficient between children's and parents' years of schooling

rank.name: MU050_randomtiebreak
rank.description: Expected child educational rank from a person born in bottom half (breaking ties at random)
